attributes.action: Legalize Cannabis for people with auto-immune condititions + severe chronic pain
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis could be the key to changing our lives, our hope from being bedbound or housbound, it could give us hope for the future, that our lives could be made a bit more easier with cannabis as an option.
please consider this for us, legalizing Cannabis could lead to hope of new treatments and changing our whole lives for us who live with Chronic pain.
attributes.background: please will you legalize Cannabis. even if its for people like me and others i know that have gone through all the chemical treatments from the doctors and the hospital and end up either immune to them, or they stop working, by this stage we have no quality of life.
